flawed_nl_solution:
Jen scored 20 + 10 = <<20+10=30>>30 on the exam.
Sammy scored two less, so his score was30 - 2 = <<30-2=33>>33.
Thus, Sammy made 35 - 33 = <<35-33=2>>2 mistakes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
